channel.title: My Project [317~Delta]
channel.description:
[size=16pt][shadow=red,left][b]Project[/b][/shadow][/size]
I downloaded the Deltascape source. I am looking to add as much features as i can, and totally change around the areas and more. This is not going to be a great big project. I will be working on it in my spare time. Haven't named project yet.
[b][u]To Do's:[/u][/b] Highscores - Completed - [url=http://localhost/highscores/]Highscores[/url] Stop SYI/other crashers - Completed - Used a list to allow only one connection. Server Panel - Completed - Originally it would close it a new interface, such as the wilderness sign, would open. I have added it so it re-opens after the interface closes. Fix Bugs - 33% Complete A. Wildy sign stay up after you leave wildy - Fixed B. Fix freeze walking C. Remove dupes Change Home Change/add Shops Add PK points MAYBE G.E Full Castle Wars Full Pest Control Clean out Source
[u][b]Videos:[/b][/u] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Per1yb95PCA]Server Panel and wildy sign fix[/url]
I probably didnt include everything considering i am about to pass out from being so tired.
Any Suggestions for what i should add just post.
Please do not flame.

item.title: My Project [317~Delta]
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

I think its funny how people say

‘GL on adding pk points’

Its the easiest thing in the fucking world.

public int pkPoints = 0;

then adding them into your char files… (simple c+p with 2 words renaming, not gonna post it…)

then add this into kill method…

killerz.pkPoints += 5

death…

pkPoints = -5

Woo hoo, you’ve completed PK Points!

Read full topic

item.title: My Project [317~Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

[size=16pt][shadow=red,left]Project[/shadow][/size]

I downloaded the Deltascape source. I am looking to add as much features as i can, and totally change around the areas and more. This is not going to be a great big project. I will be working on it in my spare time. Haven’t named project yet.

To Do’s:
Highscores - Completed - Highscores
Stop SYI/other crashers - Completed - Used a list to allow only one connection.
Server Panel - Completed - Originally it would close it a new interface, such as the wilderness sign, would open. I have added it so it re-opens after the interface closes.
Fix Bugs - 33% Complete
A. Wildy sign stay up after you leave wildy - Fixed
B. Fix freeze walking
C. Remove dupes
Change Home
Change/add Shops
Add PK points
MAYBE G.E
Full Castle Wars
Full Pest Control
Clean out Source

Videos:
Server Panel and wildy sign fix

I probably didnt include everything considering i am about to pass out from being so tired.

Any Suggestions for what i should add just post.

Please do not flame.
